title: Magic.Video.Converter.v8.0.8.25
description:
Magic Video Converter v8.0.8.25 (Your Ulimate Video Converter!) 

Magic Video Converter is a program that is very easy to use, it&#039;s simple and has a great interface. It works great with WIndows Vista.

Magic Video Converter - multi-converter with integrated editor and recorder, which can help you convert file in a specific format: AVI, MPEG, MPEG 1, MPEG 2, MPEG 4, VCD, DVD, SVCD, RMVB, RM, WMV and other video formats . In addition, the program allows: capturing video from DV cameras and nalog, VCR, TV tuners and WEB cameras; use batch mode converting; extract audio track from a video sequence to decompose video graphics; select and configure optimal codecs compress your files. The program supports most writers CD / DVD drives, has a simple and intuitive interface, high speed and high conversion quality of the result.

Magic Video Converter can convert and split almost any media format (Look at Supported Files) such as AVI, MPEG, MPEG 1, MPEG 2, MPEG 4, VCD, DVD, SVCD, RMVB, RM, and WMV and some new format such as .flv which is used on youtube, h.264, .mkv etc. Besides, it is compatible with DVD burning which is very easy to use. You can also create burning menu with it.

Magic Video Converter can convert to following files:

3GP - AAC - AC3 - AMR - ASF - AVI - MOV - MP2 - MP3 - MP4 - MPEG - RM - SWF - WAV - WMV - VOB

Screenshot:
 <a href="
http://i229.photobucket.com/albums/ee108/ultimate-caffe/mvc_screenshot.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://i229.photobucket.com/albums/ee108/ultimate-caffe/mvc_screenshot.jpg</a>

Features:

      ? Convert AVI, MPEG, MPEG 1, MPEG 2, MPEG 4, VCD, DVD, SVCD, RMVB, RM, WMV, MOV, DIVX and other video format;
      burn DVD and create menu;
      ? Convert your movies in batch mode;
      ? Split AVI, VCD, DVD or other videos into several ones
      ? Customize video screen size, audio / video bit rate, frame rate, aspect
      ? Much, much more ...



Magic Video Converter supports following files:
Quote:
.3gp........................... - 3GPP Files and 3GPP2 Files
.aac........................... - AAC Files
.ac3........................... - Raw AC3 Files
.amr........................... - AMR Audio Files
.avi........................... - AVI Files
.cmf........................... - Casio Movie Format Files
.dv or .dif.................... - DV Video Files
.flv........................... - Flv files (youtube)
.gif........................... - Animated GIF Files
.h261.......................... - Raw h261 Files
.h261 or h.264................. - Raw h264 Video Files
.m4a or .mp4a.................. - MPEG-4 Audio Files
.m4v........................... - Raw MPEG4 Video Files
.mjpg or .mjpeg................ - MJPEG Video Files
.mkv........................... - Matroska Files
.mov or .qt.................... - QuickTime Files
.mp2........................... - MP2 Files
.mp3........................... - MP3 Files
.mp4........................... - MPEG-4 Files
.mpc or .mpp................... - Mousepack Audio Files
.mpg, .mpeg, .mpa, .dat or .vob - MPEG Files
.nut........................... - NUT Files
.ogg........................... - Ogg Vorbis Files
.rm or .rmvb................... - Real Media Files
.str........................... - Old PlayStation Files
.swf........................... - Macromedia Flash Files
.ts or .trp.................... - HDTV Transport Stream Files
.wav, .au or .aiff............. - WAV Files
.viv........................... - VIV Files
.wma, wmv or .asf.............. - Windows Media Files
.yuv........................... - Raw Video Files


Requirements:
Microsoft Windows ME/2000/XP/Vista (all of the last updates installed are recommended)
Intel or AMD or compatible processors at 166 MHz minimum
Display graphics minimum resolution of 800x600x 256 color
RAM 32 megabytes (MB)
Minimum 40 MB of free hard disk space is needed for installation, minimum 100 Mb for proper working
Administrative permissions are required for installation
Internet connection to register the product
Sound card
